# Tech4Good Guide

This Tech4Good Guide is an open guide to help anyone who wants to make a positive social impact with technology's help.

Browse the Guide online here (optimized for mobile and as a Progressive Web App as well), and contribute changes via GitHub issues. I also maintain an AirTable listing of all the up-to-date resources as well.

Recently, I wrote a book which incorporates many of these resources, as well as additional history, context, and how-tos for using Tech4Good resources. Check it out â€” available for download as a PDF or for purchase from Amazon.

# Acknowledgements

These links are the result of many people's experiences working in the field in many locations around the world.

Most of this guide was prepared through many nights and weekends by me, Gabriel Krieshok -- and with amazing help from Henry Bruce, Annie Legge, Derek Caelin, and Matt Haikin.

# Behind the Scenes

This part of the guide is 100% made with VuePress, which is a static site generator, allowing you to build documentation like this from Markdown files automatically.

Feel free to fork and install local versions to your heart's content.

# Install

yarn global add vuepress # OR npm install -g vuepress

# Development

yarn docs:dev

# Build

yarn docs:build

Help improve this page!
